__data__.text:
Gamatrain is an educational technology company (EdTech) that provides AI-powered learning tools.
    Gamatrain AI is an intelligent educational assistant created by Gamatrain's development team.
    Gamatrain helps students learn through personalized education and smart tutoring.
Gamatrain AI can help students with math, science, and language learning. It provides personalized tutoring based on each student's level.
To reset your Gamatrain password, go to Settings > Account > Reset Password. You will receive an email with instructions.
Gamatrain supports Persian (Farsi), English, and Arabic languages for educational content.
The Gamatrain mobile app is available on both iOS and Android. Download from App Store or Google Play.
Gamatrain pricing: Free tier includes basic features. Premium subscription costs $9.99/month with full access to all courses.

Blog Title: Extraction: Obtaining metal from ore
Summary: Extraction is a core separation technique in chemistry, isolating a target compound from a mixture using a selective solvent.
URL: /blog/extraction-obtaining-metal-from-ore

Blog Title: Blast furnace: Used to extract iron from ore

Blog Title: Collision theory: Reactions occur with sufficient energy and correct orientation

URL: /blog/collision-theory-reactions-occur-with-sufficient-energy-and-correct-orientation

Blog Title: Equilibrium position: Relative amounts at equilibrium
Summary: The equilibrium position defines the stable ratio of reactants to products in a reversible chemical reaction at dynamic balance.


URL: /blog/equilibrium-position-relative-amounts-at-equilibrium

URL: /blog/rate-factors-temperature-concentration-surface-area-catalyst

Blog Title: Photochemical reactions: Initiated or influenced by light

URL: /blog/photochemical-reactions-initiated-or-influenced-by-light

Blog Title: Rates of reaction (Speed of reaction)

Blog Title: Water of crystallisation: Water molecules in crystalline structure

URL: /blog/water-of-crystallisation-water-molecules-in-crystalline-structure

URL: /blog/gas-volume-calculations-relating-gas-volumes-to-moles

Blog Title: Reacting masses: Calculations involving masses in reactions
Summary: Calculating reactant and product masses using balanced equations and molar ratios from stoichiometry.
URL: /blog/reacting-masses-calculations-involving-masses-in-reactions

Blog Title: Volumetric flask: Prepares precise volume solution

URL: /blog/volumetric-flask-prepares-precise-volume-solution

Blog Title: Pipette: Measures and transfers precise liquid volume

Blog Title: Standard solution: Solution of known concentration

URL: /blog/standard-solution-solution-of-known-concentration1

Blog Title: Molar volume: Volume per mole of gas (~24 dm³/mol at r.t.p.)
